protein.general_function: Involved in translation release factor activity, codon specific
protein.specific_function: Directs the termination of nascent peptide synthesis (translation) in response to the termination codons UAA, UAG and UGA

go_class.description: translation factor activity, nucleic acid binding
translation release factor activity, codon specific
